channel.title: Lolwut
channel.description: A'ight this might sound creepy but delta's dialogues are kinda weird, im making dialogues and everything was going okay until i was trying it and the dialogue wont continue, i mean and npc would say the first case but when i click to continue, it will throw me the same dialogue, i've had that problem before but now its rlly annoying me. anyhelp? base delta

item.title: Lolwut
item.dc:creator: @strucker Strucker
item.description:
@strucker wrote:


case 203:
			playertalk(590, "Maybe later..");
			break;
			case 204:
			playertalk(590, "Sure, what do you need?");
			break;
			case 205:
			talk2("First of all take this with its power", "Youll be able to be a goblin without them noticing.", 1835);
			addItem(####, 1);
			break;
			case 206:
			talk2("You have to go to their village and ", "recover the gifts.", 1835);
			break;
